row.sql:
SELECT REPLACE(NOTES,'@@@@',CHR(10)) from ( SELECT LISTAGG(NOTES,'@@@@') WITHIN GROUP ( ORDER BY COL1) AS NOTES FROM (select TO_CLOB(company_code||' -'||currency_code||' - '||scenario_type)||'
' NOTES,COL1 from (select distinct company_code,currency_code,scenario_type,3 as COL1 from COSTAR_ERP_VALIDATION_REPORT where company_code not in (select distinct company_code from COSTAR_ERP_VALIDATION_REPORT where scenario_type='WARNING') UNION ALL select distinct company_code,currency_code,scenario_type,3 as COL1 from COSTAR_ERP_VALIDATION_REPORT where scenario_type='WARNING' union select 'Company_code','Currency_code','Status',2 as COL1 from dual union select 'List of data processed for CCL',null,null,1 as COL1 from dual) order by COL1 ))
